alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 2:40PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN RICH...NORTHWESTERN SUMMIT AND WEST CENTRAL UINTA COUNTIES... At 239 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from 18 miles west of Robertson to Evanston...and moving southeast at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Evanston, Robertson, Ragen, Wahsatch, Almy, Altamont, Piedmont and Leroy. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 190 and 196. * winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to produce hazardous driving conditions. travel is not advised during this snow squall. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on to increase the visibility of your vehicle to those around you.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
